Primary source material for the study of World War I that includes personal narratives, diaries, newspapers, posters, postcards, photographs, printed books, military and government files, ephemera, artwork, personal artifacts and film. Includes three modules: Personal Experiences Propaganda and Recruitment Visual Perspectives and Narratives.

Free, full-text, searchable access to patents from 1976 to the present; TIFF or PDF copies of patents can be downloaded for free (TIFF is downloaded one page at a time); free registration required to display PDF files.
